content.question: System.out.print(*); // Line 1System.out.print("*"); // Line 2System.out.println(); // Line 3System.out.println("*"); // Line 4The code segment is intended to produce the following output, but may not work as intended.***Which line of code, if any, causes an error?

choices.label: The code segment works as intended.

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
